translation.ja: 迷惑料さ

translation.en: Yo, I don't need news vans and cops all over this neighborhood.
translation.ja: 記者や警官も邪魔なんだよ

translation.en: I'm warning you.
translation.ja: 忠告を聞け

translation.en: -Attack! -[barking]
translation.ja: やれ！

translation.en: Stop, stop!
translation.ja: 早く止めて

translation.en: Don't you dare, Buck!
translation.ja: 行くな！

translation.en: [Buck whimpers] Oh, my God.
translation.ja: 大変だ

translation.en: -[dog yelps] -What the fuck?
translation.ja: ウソだろ

translation.en: -Don't bite my dog! -[dog whimpering]
translation.ja: 犬を放せ！

translation.en: [shushing] You're good.
translation.ja: いい子ね

translation.en: You're okay.
translation.ja: 大丈夫よ

translation.en: [Buck] Wait.
translation.ja: ねえ

translation.en: How did you get your sight?
translation.ja: なぜ見えるの？

translation.en: [Steve] Come on, boy. Yo, Axel, come on.
translation.ja: 来い バクスター

translation.en: Come on.
translation.ja: ほら

translation.en: Crazy fuck.
translation.ja: なんて変人だ

translation.en: You can't just disappear like that, Prairie. You scared us.
translation.ja: 姿を消さないで　プレーリー

translation.en: Please don't call me that.
translation.ja: 別の呼び方を

translation.en: What am I supposed to do?
translation.ja: 私はどうすべき？

translation.en: [stammers] Help me a little.
translation.ja: 少しは教えて

translation.en: You-- You won't talk to the FBI...
translation.ja: ＦＢＩには話さないし―

translation.en: but you... you won't talk to me either. I...
translation.ja: 私にも何も言ってくれない

translation.en: [stammers] I read about trauma online. I know that--
translation.ja: 心の回復を手伝えるし…

translation.en: It would help if you would let me go online.
translation.ja: ならネットを使わせて

translation.en: To find Homer?
translation.ja: ホーマーを捜すの？

translation.en: You watched my video?
translation.ja: 録画を見たの？

translation.en: Well, to try to help you.
translation.ja: 力になろうと…

translation.en: -Are you hearing voices again? -I'm not hearing anything!
translation.ja: また幻聴を？ 違うわ

translation.en: When you were a little girl first learning how to cane...
translation.ja: 昔 この家で 杖を使い始めた頃

translation.en: you got too confident too fast.
translation.ja: あなたは調子に乗って―

translation.en: You decided to run.
translation.ja: 走り出したわ

translation.en: You smacked into the edge of a wall and split your forehead open.
translation.ja: そして壁に激突して 額を切った

translation.en: Do you remember that?
translation.ja: 覚えてる？

translation.en: I... I know that you're not my flesh and blood...
translation.ja: あなたとは 血がつながってない

translation.en: but when that happened...
translation.ja: でも あの時―

translation.en: I knew that you were my daughter.
translation.ja: 実の娘だと思った

translation.en: Because I felt it.
translation.ja: だって感じたの

translation.en: I felt like I got hit by that wall, too.
translation.ja: 自分も壁に激突したような 痛みをね

translation.en: It's what I feel like now.
translation.ja: 今だって同じ

translation.en: This is strange... for both of us.
translation.ja: なのに こんな状態は変だわ

translation.en: -[stammering] You've got these-- -[gasps]
translation.ja: そんな傷を負っても…

translation.en: -[exhales] -But you're... you're not a stranger.
translation.ja: あなたは他人じゃないのよ

translation.en: Mom, please. It's not that I don't want to tell you. I want to...
translation.ja: 話すのがイヤで 隠してるわけじゃ…

translation.en: It's that it would hurt me to hurt you.
translation.ja: 傷つけたら つらいし

translation.en: And it would hurt you.
translation.ja: ママも苦しむ

translation.en: Just give me some time.
translation.ja: 時間が要るの

translation.en: Watch it.
translation.ja: 気をつけろ

translation.en: Come on. Hey. He's not worth it.
translation.ja: よせ　構うな

translation.en: [choir singing] ♪ Come along ♪
translation.ja: 幸せを夢見てた

translation.en: ♪ Swears she knew it Now she swears it's gone ♪
translation.ja: 分かってたけど 　　失ってしまった

translation.en: ♪ She lies and says She's in love with him ♪
translation.ja: 彼を愛してるとウソをつく

translation.en: ♪ Can't find a better man ♪
translation.ja: これ以上の人は現れない

translation.en: ♪ She dreams in color She dreams in red ♪
translation.ja: 色付きの夢や 　　赤く染まった夢を見る

translation.en: ♪ Can't find a better man ♪
translation.ja: これ以上の人は現れない

translation.en: [Steve] Yo, dude! Stop!
translation.ja: おい　待てよ

translation.en: Man, I heard you singing in there.
translation.ja: 歌を聴いたぜ

translation.en: Like... whoa!
translation.ja: お前 すごいな

translation.en: Hey, you and your mom just moved into Crestwood, right?
translation.ja: 俺と家が近いって？

translation.en: What's your name?
translation.ja: 名前は？

translation.en: Miles.
translation.ja: マイルズ

translation.en: -I gotta run. -Man, what are you gonna do with that?
translation.ja: じゃあ 将来は何を？

translation.en: You could be, like, famous.
translation.ja: きっと有名になれる

translation.en: I don't really want to talk to you.
translation.ja: 君とは関わりたくない

translation.en: What?
translation.ja: 何だと？

translation.en: [sighs] You made fun of one of my friends for being gay, and now you hear me sing and it's, like, all good?
translation.ja: 僕の仲間をバカにしたのに 歌を聴いて態度を変えるの？

translation.en: -It's not like American Idol, like... -Uh-huh.
translation.ja: 「アメリカン･アイドル」 じゃあるまいし

translation.en: -Not in a mean way, but... -I get it. Relax, man.
translation.ja: 「アメリカン･アイドル」 じゃあるまいし なるほどな

translation.en: Hey, Miles?
translation.ja: マイルズ

translation.en: [OA] I feel something forming.
translation.ja: 固まってきてる

translation.en: Not a plan, but... a feeling.
translation.ja: 計画じゃなくて 感情がね

translation.en: I met this boy and I think he has something to do with it.
translation.ja: 出会った少年と関係あるはず

translation.en: I keep trying to imagine you at his age.
translation.ja: 少年のあなたを想像してる

translation.en: Sixteen, seventeen.
translation.ja: 16歳や17歳の…

translation.en: [Steve] Please.
translation.ja: 開けてくれ

translation.en: [chuckles] What you up to, crazy?
translation.ja: 元気か　変人？

translation.en: Looks weird in here.
translation.ja: 妙な部屋だ

translation.en: I got a mobile router.
translation.ja: ルーターをやる

translation.en: Just hook it up to your laptop, bam, it's connected, and paid for.
translation.ja: 接続すれば使えるし 料金も支払い済み

translation.en: -Oh, my God. -[chuckles] You want me to set it up?
translation.ja: ほんと？ 付けてやる

translation.en: Yeah. [chuckles]
translation.ja: ええ

translation.en: So, uh, I was thinking...
translation.ja: ところで― 「見知らぬ乗客」って 映画を見た？

translation.en: have you ever seen Strangers on a Train?
translation.ja: 「見知らぬ乗客」って 映画を見た？

translation.en: No.
translation.ja: いいえ

translation.en: Basically, it's like, if people don't know you're connected...
translation.ja: 接点のない２人が 手を組み―

translation.en: then they can't figure out the crimes you do for each other.
translation.ja: 犯罪を成功させる話だ

translation.en: Thought I'd help you out and you could help me out.
translation.ja: 俺たちも助け合わない？

translation.en: I do need help.
translation.ja: いい考えね

translation.en: Good.
translation.ja: よし

translation.en: -You gonna plug that in? -Oh.
translation.ja: 接続は？

translation.en: [chuckles] You're crazy.
translation.ja: 変な奴だ

translation.en: All right.
translation.ja: いいぞ

translation.en: Where's your mouse?
translation.ja: マウスは？

translation.en: -You use this. -[typing] -And then, right here... -All right, yeah.
translation.ja: キーボードで打ったら エンターを押すの

translation.en: -Enter. -I got it. I got it.
translation.ja: 了解

translation.en: [automated voice] Launch Safari. Search YouTube.
translation.ja: ブラウザ起動　YouTube検索

translation.en: -A-S-H-E-V. -[chuckles]
translation.ja: Ａ Ｓ Ｈ Ｅ Ｖ…

translation.en: So, that's the trouble we need to get me out of.
translation.ja: この問題を解決したい

translation.en: My dad wants to send me to Asheville to get, like... straightened out.
translation.ja: “アシュビル”っていう 更生施設へ送られるかも

translation.en: No one really goes there voluntarily, if you know what I mean.
translation.ja: 自ら行く奴はいない

translation.en: -[mother] Gentle. -[boy] Mom!
translation.ja: 優しく 母さん

translation.en: -[mother] Don't hurt him. I'm sorry. -[boy] Mom! Mama!
translation.ja: 手荒なマネはしないで 許して

translation.en: [man] Keep it going, man. Go, go, go.
translation.ja: そのまま進め　来い

translation.en: [mother] Don't hurt him, please.
translation.ja: 乱暴はやめて

translation.en: -[boy] Mom! -[OA] I'll help you.
translation.ja: 母さん 協力する

translation.en: But I have conditions.
translation.ja: 条件をのめばね

translation.en: I need five people.
translation.ja: ５人集めて

translation.en: And I need them to be strong like you are, and flexible and brave.
translation.ja: あなたのように 強くて柔軟な人を

translation.en: And I need to use the abandoned house as a meeting place.
translation.ja: あの空き家を集合場所に使う

translation.en: -Sure. Whatever you want. -And no touching.
translation.ja: ああ 分かった 触らないで

translation.en: I don't like to be touched.
translation.ja: 不快なの

translation.en: [scoffs] No touching. No big deal.
translation.ja: 了解　お安いご用さ

translation.en: You'll really do all that?
translation.ja: 全部できる？

translation.en: Well, Strangers on a Train. That's the idea. But you gotta keep your end first.
translation.ja: 手を組むんだからな でも まずは俺の件だ

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: いいわ

translation.en: -So, what happened? -Nothing. Doesn't matter.
translation.ja: 何があったの？ どうでもいいけど 彼女に好きな男がいてさ

translation.en: She said she likes some guy in chorus.
translation.ja: どうでもいいけど 彼女に好きな男がいてさ

translation.en: [scoffs] Come on.
translation.ja: それじゃダメだ

translation.en: Well, it's okay. You don't want to go there until your invisible self is more developed anyway.
translation.ja: 内なる自分が成長すれば 見えてくる

translation.en: What?
translation.ja: 何が？

translation.en: You know, your... longings, the desires you don't tell anyone about.
translation.ja: 例えば 心に秘めてる夢や願望よ

translation.en: [scoffs] I was just starting to think you were okay, but you blew it.
translation.ja: 信用し始めたら これか

translation.en: You spend a lot of time on the visible you. It's impressive. But she probably thinks the invisible you is missing.
translation.ja: 上辺ばかりで中身がないと 彼女は思ってるのかも

translation.en: I have desires. I work hard.
translation.ja: 願望はあるし 努力もしてる

translation.en: I'm not gonna learn Chinese tomorrow and be, like, a CEO or some shit. But I want stuff.
translation.ja: 会社経営者とかじゃないけど 夢はある

translation.en: Like what?
translation.ja: どんな？

translation.en: [stammering] You know, to be somebody.
translation.ja: 有名になりたいんだ

translation.en: I have ambitions. I'm gonna be a trainer to celebrities.
translation.ja: セレブを指導する トレーナーとしてね

translation.en: I'll have my own show, my own line of equipment. Me and Jesse have a YouTube channel already.
translation.ja: 番組を持つために 動画も公開してる

translation.en: That's stuff on the outside, though. What about the stuff on the inside?
translation.ja: それも上辺よ　内面は？

translation.en: Who the fuck asked you, crazy?
translation.ja: 何様のつもりだ

translation.en: You're a grown-up who still lives at your parents' and tried to kill yourself.
translation.ja: スネかじりの死に損ないが

translation.en: [Steve] Let's just say this girl was worried about my invisible side...
translation.ja: 彼女は俺とヤりたいだけだ

translation.en: Which she's not, 'cause she just likes to fuck.
translation.ja: でも仮に 問題が俺の内面なら―

translation.en: But say she was... How do I, like, show her I got it?
translation.ja: どうやって人間性を 示せばいい？

translation.en: Ugh! Yo, be gentle with that shit, OA.
translation.ja: 雑に扱うな　ＯＡ

translation.en: Maybe try closing your eyes.
translation.ja: 目を閉じてみたら？

translation.en: Just more often or...
translation.ja: いつも以上に

translation.en: Being blind was powerful. It made me listen.
translation.ja: 見えなければ 耳を傾けるようになる

translation.en: [sighs] And it made people underestimate me.
translation.ja: みんなは私を侮ってた

translation.en: [OA] Yeah. It's boring... at first.
translation.ja: そうよ 最初は退屈に感じるわ

translation.en: You gotta do a grown-up hairdo.
translation.ja: 髪形も大人っぽくな

translation.en: Oh, hey, don't I know you?
translation.ja: あの 以前に会った？

translation.en: Yeah. [chuckles] I'm a parent.
translation.ja: ええ　生徒の親ですので

translation.en: [Broderick-Allen] I'm sorry. I have a meeting.
translation.ja: 面談を控えてます

translation.en: Uh, I think I am your meeting.
translation.ja: 私が面談者かと

translation.en: I'm expecting Mr. Winchell. We've been speaking.
translation.ja: 相手はウィンチェル氏です

translation.en: I'm, uh, Steve's stepmother.
translation.ja: 私は義理の母です

translation.en: Oh, of course.
translation.ja: なるほど

translation.en: Have a seat.
translation.ja: どうぞ

translation.en: Well, I'm not calling this meeting to blame you or your husband.
translation.ja: さて… 来校いただいたのは 他でもなく―

translation.en: I'm calling this meeting to let you know that your son, your husband's son,
translation.ja: 息子さんのことで ご報告があるからです

translation.en: has become such a problem that I'm asking the school board for his immediate expulsion.
translation.ja: 現在 彼の退学を 教育委員会に求めてます

translation.en: Could you explain the problem?
translation.ja: 具体的な問題は？

translation.en: I think it should be obvious from my probation letter, but if I must...
translation.ja: 事前通告書に 記したとおりですが―

translation.en: I'm here to teach the kids that want to learn, the kids that have a desire to better themselves.
translation.ja: 向上心のある生徒を 教育するのが私の務めです

translation.en: And if a disruptive, violent, and frankly, terrible student
translation.ja: 例えば 態度や素行が悪い 問題児の場合には―

translation.en: causes me problems, that's fine. I can handle that.
translation.ja: 例えば 態度や素行が悪い 問題児の場合には― 私も対処します

translation.en: But when he costs the hardworking students their right to an education, that's when I say no more.
translation.ja: でも真面目な生徒の権利を 奪う者は手に負えません

translation.en: I think he has real psychological issues.
translation.ja: 彼は心に問題を抱えてます

translation.en: Well, it's not really a measure of mental health to be well-adjusted -in a society that's very sick. -[chuckles lightly]
translation.ja: 病んだ社会に順応しても 心が健康とは言えません

translation.en: That's a very clever bumper sticker, Mrs. Winchell,
translation.ja: 実に機知に富んだ 意見ですが―

translation.en: but I'm going to remove your son from this school.
translation.ja: 彼には退学してもらいます

translation.en: [softly] Right.
translation.ja: そう…

translation.en: What was your first reason?
translation.ja: 志望動機は？

translation.en: I'm sorry?
translation.ja: 何の話？

translation.en: Why did you become a teacher?
translation.ja: なぜ教師に？

translation.en: -This isn't about me. -But it is.
translation.ja: 関係ないわ

translation.en: It's about you and Steve, and the play, cast of two,
translation.ja: でも先生とスティーヴは 教室を舞台に―

translation.en: setting, classroom, over many dimensions through time.
translation.ja: さまざまな次元で 時を共有します

translation.en: I don't follow.
translation.ja: つまり？

translation.en: Maybe Steve can't learn because you lost track of your reason.
translation.ja: 原因は先生が 初心を忘れたせいかも

translation.en: -Oh, God, this is ridiculous. -Betty...
translation.ja: バカげてる 待って

translation.en: Maybe I can help you remember.
translation.ja: 力を貸すわ

translation.en: You lost someone. Someone important to you.
translation.ja: あなたは大事な人を失った

translation.en: I lost someone important to me, too.
translation.ja: 私も大事な人を失いました

translation.en: -Who'd you lose? -My patience if you don't stop.
translation.ja: どなたを？ 本気で怒りますよ

translation.en: Was it your first love? Or a parent?
translation.ja: 初恋の人？ ご両親？

translation.en: Someone you loved young?
translation.ja: 昔の恋人？

translation.en: A sibling?
translation.ja: ご兄弟？

translation.en: Look, you want to talk turkey?
translation.ja: では はっきり言います

translation.en: Your sociopath of a son punched a kid in the throat.
translation.ja: 息子さんは 生徒に暴行しました

translation.en: The victim didn't report it because he feared reprisal.
translation.ja: 被害者は 通報しませんでしたが―

translation.en: That boy has a lacerated trachea and is unable to sing at Nationals.
translation.ja: 気管を損傷し 合唱の全国大会で歌えません

translation.en: So, I don't give a crap where the violence comes from and why. I don't want it in my school.
translation.ja: 経緯や理由はどうあれ 私は校内暴力は ごめんです

translation.en: No, you're right. Sorry, you're right.
translation.ja: そのとおりね

translation.en: You're right. This dimension is crumbling to violence and pettiness
translation.ja: 確かに今いる次元は暴力的で 偏狭で欲にまみれてる

translation.en: and greed, and Steve is sensitive enough to feel it and he's angry.
translation.ja: 確かに今いる次元は暴力的で 偏狭で欲にまみれてる スティーヴも それを察して 途方に暮れてるわ

translation.en: He's angry and he's lost.
translation.ja: スティーヴも それを察して 途方に暮れてるわ

translation.en: And in order to find him, you'd have to teach yourself again,
translation.ja: 彼のためにも取り戻すべきよ

translation.en: and you decided somewhere along the way that you were done learning.
translation.ja: 彼のためにも取り戻すべきよ 諦めてしまった 教師としての情熱を…

translation.en: It's... it's too painful to stay open.
translation.ja: 諦めてしまった 教師としての情熱を… これじゃ つらすぎる

translation.en: Well, I think we all face the same hopelessness, Mrs. Winchell. It's what we decide to do with it.
translation.ja: 同じ絶望感を抱く私たちが 決断を下すべきかと

translation.en: You're right. So what are you gonna do?
translation.ja: そうね どうする？

translation.en: If you want to do your job, expel the bully.
translation.ja: 乱暴な生徒を 退学させれば―

translation.en: Focus on the kid who sings like an angel even though he doesn't need you.
translation.ja: 優れた生徒が残り 手はかからない

translation.en: If you want to be a teacher, teach Steve.
translation.ja: でも教師として彼を指導して

translation.en: He's the boy you can help become a man.
translation.ja: あなたなら彼を救える

translation.en: He's the one you lost. He's your first reason.
translation.ja: 彼こそが見失った 最初の動機だもの

translation.en: I didn't catch your first name, Mrs. Winchell.
translation.ja: あなたの ファーストネームは？

translation.en: I'm the OA.
translation.ja: 私はＯＡ

translation.en: [Broderick-Allen] Okay, a show of hands...
translation.ja: 出欠を取るわよ

translation.en: A story of a shocking miracle emerged from Jefferson City today.
translation.ja: ミズーリ州から 奇跡のニュースです

translation.en: Last fall, Pershing College's star quarterback
translation.ja: 昨秋 アメフトの 大学選手権で―

translation.en: was expected to bring Missouri the championship title
translation.ja: ある選手の活躍が 期待されました

translation.en: until a near fatal accident on the field left him paralyzed and locked in a coma.
translation.ja: しかし 決勝戦で重傷を負い 昏睡に陥りました

translation.en: [man] He ain't movin'.
translation.ja: 動かない

translation.en: [news anchor] And as they held hands around their son's dying body, a miracle happened. He woke up.
translation.ja: ところが 死を待つ彼に 奇跡が起き 目覚めたのです

translation.en: [reporter] You had what they call a near-death experience?
translation.ja: 臨死体験をしたんですね

translation.en: Yeah, I flatlined, uh, after the accident, at the hospital.
translation.ja: ああ　あの事故の後 病院で心停止したんだ

translation.en: [reporter] So, you know what it's like to die?
translation.ja: 死が何か分かった？

translation.en: [Homer] Um...
translation.ja: えっと…

translation.en: Yes, I... I guess I do. Um...
translation.ja: そうだね　分かったと思う

translation.en: But I'm back now.
translation.ja: でも生還した 〝ホーマー･ロバーツ 悲劇の決勝戦を語る ２００７年11月２日〞

translation.en: And I'm not... I'm not leaving the championship game on a stretcher this year.
translation.ja: 〝ホーマー･ロバーツ 悲劇の決勝戦を語る ２００７年11月２日〞 今年は決勝戦中に 救急搬送されたりしない

translation.en: -[man] Atta boy. -I'm leaving with that ring.
translation.ja: 優勝して立ち去る

translation.en: [whispers] Homer...
translation.ja: ホーマー

translation.en: Homer, where are you? [sobbing]
translation.ja: どこにいるの？

translation.en: [Nancy] Prairie, there's an important phone call for you.
translation.ja: プレーリー 大事な電話がかかってきてる

translation.en: I can't talk right now.
translation.ja: 今は話せない

translation.en: I think you should. It's the FBI.
translation.ja: 出たほうがいいわ　ＦＢＩよ

translation.en: Hello?
translation.ja: どうも

translation.en: [Steve exhales] That was like the Spanish Inquisition.
translation.ja: ひどい尋問だった

translation.en: Um, would you mind if I talked on my own?
translation.ja: １人で話しても？

translation.en: -Of course. -Thank you.
translation.ja: もちろんよ ありがとう

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.ja: 助かる

translation.en: It was like Invaders of the Body Snatchers.
translation.ja: あのブロデリックが―

translation.en: Broderick-Allen is a different person.
translation.ja: 完全に別人になった

translation.en: Listen, I need five people, and I need them tonight.
translation.ja: お願い　５人集めて 夜までによ 早急に始めなきゃ

translation.en: We have to get started because it's gonna take some time.
translation.ja: 夜までによ 早急に始めなきゃ

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa. Chill. What are you talking about?
translation.ja: おい 何の話だ？

translation.en: Strangers on the Train. You owe me.
translation.ja: 手を組む話よ

translation.en: They need to be strong and they need to be flexible like you are.
translation.ja: 強く柔軟な人が要るの

translation.en: -Why? What for? -I didn't ask you questions, did I?
translation.ja: 何のために？ 私は黙って従った

translation.en: No, you were cool.
translation.ja: ああ　確かに

translation.en: Midnight, at the abandoned house.
translation.ja: 真夜中― 空き家に集合

translation.en: And everybody needs to leave their front door open. That's important.
translation.ja: 玄関の扉は開けたままで来て

translation.en: I always forget how crazy you are. Nobody is doing that.
translation.ja: そんな指示に誰も従わない 泥棒が入る

translation.en: -That's how you get your shit stolen. -Steve...
translation.ja: そんな指示に誰も従わない 泥棒が入る スティーヴ…

translation.en: Look, I've got something going tonight, all right?
translation.ja: 今夜は予定がある

translation.en: And with the router, I... I think we're pretty even.
translation.ja: ルーターを用立てたし 借りはない

translation.en: Steve, you punched a kid in the throat. You didn't tell me that.
translation.ja: あなた 生徒に暴行したこと 隠してたわね？

translation.en: Look, I'm at the end of a rope I should've fallen off of a long time ago.
translation.ja: 手遅れになりそうで 切羽詰まってる

translation.en: And I need to help someone.
translation.ja: 人を助けたくて―

translation.en: It's a long shot, but you're strong, that's why I chose you.
translation.ja: 強さを持つ あなたを選んだの

translation.en: I chose you, crazy.
translation.ja: 俺が選んだんだ

translation.en: You sure about that?
translation.ja: そうかしら？

translation.en: Midnight. Five people. You gave me your word.
translation.ja: 約束どおり 真夜中に５人集めて

translation.en: All right. Yeah, don't have a panic attack.
translation.ja: 分かったよ　取り乱すなって

translation.en: Um, Mr. Winchell?
translation.ja: あら ウィンチェルさん

translation.en: -Yes, yes, Mrs... -Uh, Broderick-Allen.
translation.ja: ああ　担任の… ブロデリックです

translation.en: Yes. Nice to see you.
translation.ja: そうだ　どうも

translation.en: Yeah, I wouldn't have stopped you, I don't like to talk to parents unless it's in the classroom,
translation.ja: 校外で生徒の親と話すのは 控えてるんですが…

translation.en: but I wanted to tell you, I think she's a unique woman. And I think she's gonna turn Steve's life around.
translation.ja: 彼女は個性的な方だし 息子さんを変えそうですね

translation.en: And I want you to know I'm committed to help.
translation.ja: 私も力を尽くします

translation.en: That girl, his girlfriend?
translation.ja: 彼女とは息子の恋人？

translation.en: No, no. Uh, your, your new wife.
translation.ja: あなたの新しい奥様です

translation.en: -His what? -The new Mrs. Winchell.
translation.ja: 今 何と？ “新しい奥様”と

translation.en: -I'm Mrs. Winchell. -[chuckles softly]
translation.ja: 妻は私よ

translation.en: [Mrs. Winchell] Nancy, Abel, it's the Winchells.
translation.ja: ナンシー　ウィンチェルよ

translation.en: Now's not the best time. Prairie's taking a nap.
translation.ja: あいにくプレーリーは 昼寝中なの

translation.en: Oh, I bet she is. Uh...
translation.ja: そうなのね あなたに話があるのよ

translation.en: -We need to talk, Nancy. -Oh, come in.
translation.ja: そうなのね あなたに話があるのよ ええ…　入って

translation.en: [Mrs. Winchell] Children should not be exposed to someone capable of identity theft.
translation.ja: 他人に成りすます人とは 会わせられない

translation.en: [Nancy] Prairie suffered a very traumatic experience--
translation.ja: 娘は悲痛な経験をしたの

translation.en: [Mr. Winchell] And we've been with you every step of the way. But if she's coercing our kids...
translation.ja: ずっと協力してきたけど 子供に害を与えるなら…

translation.en: Your son is 17, not seven. And it was his parent-teachers' conference.
translation.ja: 彼はもう17歳だし 先生との面談でしょ

translation.en: [Mr. Winchell] Steve?
translation.ja: スティーヴ

translation.en: I already told you at home.
translation.ja: 説明したろ

translation.en: [Mr. Winchell] Tell us again.
translation.ja: もう一度話せ

translation.en: She wanted Internet. And she just came up with the idea. Said it was a fair trade for a router. It's no big deal.
translation.ja: ネット接続を助けたお返しに 面談に行ってくれただけだ

translation.en: She was looking for someone named Homer.
translation.ja: 人を捜してるってさ

translation.en: -[scoffs] -[Abel] We've been neighbors for years. You were here for Prairie's homecoming.
translation.ja: 娘の帰宅を喜んでくれた 長年の隣人が―

translation.en: Makes no sense your coming over here slinging accusations.
translation.ja: こんな風に非難するなんて

translation.en: [Mr. Winchell] And we have nothing but admiration for you and Nancy...
translation.ja: 君たちは立派だけど…

translation.en: I need help.
translation.ja: 助けて

translation.en: What she's doing is disturbing.
translation.ja: 深刻な問題よ

translation.en: She's a grown woman pursuing a boy.
translation.ja: 未成年に言い寄るなんて

translation.en: She is not thinking like an adult.
translation.ja: 娘に下心なんかないわ

translation.en: You're in denial, Nancy.
translation.ja: 現実を見て

translation.en: What if this becomes sexual?
translation.ja: 性的な関係になったら？

translation.en: -That's a crime. -Are you kidding me?
translation.ja: 犯罪よ ふざけんな

translation.en: First, I have a girlfriend.
translation.ja: 女なら他にいる

translation.en: And second, this is about just... just friends.
translation.ja: 彼女と俺は ただの― 友人だ

translation.en: She doesn't have any friends and I'm being a friend. That's it. All this sick weird shit's coming from your brains.
translation.ja: 友達になっただけなのに おかしな妄想すんな

translation.en: -[Mr. Winchell] Jesus, Steven-- -She impersonated me.
translation.ja: やめなさい 母親を装ったのよ！

translation.en: Because I asked her to.
translation.ja: 俺が頼んだ

translation.en: 'Cause I wanted someone on my fucking side for once. And guess what? It actually helped.
translation.ja: 味方が欲しかったし 実際 彼女に救われた

translation.en: Come on, come on, come on, come on, come on, come on, come on.
translation.ja: ほら 早く転送して

translation.en: You did say, Abel, the doctors in St. Louis recommended that she be committed.
translation.ja: 病院側の見解では 彼女は入院が必要なんだろ

translation.en: You... you talked about that?
translation.ja: 彼に そんな話をしたの？

translation.en: [Abel] They were wrong.
translation.ja: 見立て違いだ

translation.en: But if the doctors are saying she needs serious help--
translation.ja: でも治療が必要と 言われたなら…

translation.en: She needs to be home... with us.
translation.ja: 家にいるのが一番なの

translation.en: And not to be attacked by people who lack compassion and... and understanding.
translation.ja: 理解のない人から 非難を受ける必要はない

translation.en: Oh, we understand what it's like to struggle with a child.
translation.ja: 子供のことで 悩む気持ちは分かるわ

translation.en: We're sending Steve away to get the help he needs.
translation.ja: 息子を更生施設へ送る

translation.en: Until then, keep her away from him.
translation.ja: それまで彼女を近づけないで

translation.en: Please don't take the camera.
translation.ja: カメラは返して

translation.en: Prairie, I know it's hard, but it's for the best.
translation.ja: つらいだろうけど これが一番よ

translation.en: We-- We should have followed the hospital guidelines from the beginning to keep you safe.
translation.ja: 初めから病院の指示に 従うべきだった

translation.en: What am I supposed to do? ID parents?
translation.ja: 親を疑えと言うの？

translation.en: She's disturbed.
translation.ja: 彼女は病んでる

translation.en: Do you know how I know? Those eyes. Besides that, she lies.
translation.ja: 目を見れば分かる ウソつきだしね

translation.en: Oh. Okay, sure.
translation.ja: ええ いいわ　また明日

translation.en: Yeah, see you tomorrow.
translation.ja: いいわ　また明日

translation.en: [OA] I need help.
translation.ja: 助けて

translation.en: [OA] I need help. I need to cross a border that's hard to define.
translation.ja: 助けて 境界線を越える必要がある

translation.en: Maybe you know what I'm talking about?
translation.ja: 分かるでしょ？

translation.en: Or you don't, but... you feel it.
translation.ja: 意味不明でも 感じはつかめるはずよ

translation.en: Because you've felt other borders, like youth and adulthood, maybe.
translation.ja: 子供と大人の境目とかに 似てる

translation.en: I can't change your fate... but I can help you meet it.
translation.ja: 運命は変えられないけど 私は そこへ導ける

translation.en: We begin our journey to the border tonight. Midnight.
translation.ja: 今夜０時に 境界線への旅を始める

translation.en: The unfinished house at the edge of Crestwood View.
translation.ja: 住宅街の外れの空き家でね

translation.en: Don't come unless you leave your front door open.
translation.ja: 玄関は開けてきて

translation.en: You have to invite me in.
translation.ja: 私を招くために

translation.en: Michelle, you hungry?
translation.ja: ミッシェル 空腹ならパスタを温めるよ

translation.en: You want me to warm up the spaghetti?
translation.ja: 空腹ならパスタを温めるよ

translation.en: No, I'm just grabbing my textbook from downstairs. I'm fine.
translation.ja: 下に教科書を取りに行くだけ

translation.en: [automated voice] 12:20 AM.
translation.ja: ０時20分です

translation.en: [Steve chuckles] Hey, you wanna drink a 40?
translation.ja: お前も飲む？

translation.en: [Jaye] Hey, deadbeat.
translation.ja: 飲んだくれ

translation.en: Hey yourself.
translation.ja: よう　お前か

translation.en: -Heard you punched Miles Brekov. -From who?
translation.ja: 暴行したって？ 誰に聞いた？

translation.en: Did you do that because of me?
translation.ja: 私のせい？

translation.en: [chuckles] You really think the world revolves around you, don't you?
translation.ja: 自分が世界の中心か？

translation.en: Hey, I'm not the one drinking alone with my dog.
translation.ja: 犬と晩酌するよりマシ

translation.en: Oh, please tell me, Jaye, what should I be doing, huh?
translation.ja: ジェイ　なら何をすれば？

translation.en: Whoever you did it for, it's gonna get you kicked out of school.
translation.ja: 理由が何であれ 退学だわ

translation.en: -[scoffs] -Was that the plan all along? Self-destruct?
translation.ja: それが狙い？　自滅する気？

translation.en: You really like to kick a guy when he's down.
translation.ja: 意地の悪い女だな

translation.en: Come on, get in.
translation.ja: ほら 乗って

translation.en: Chris is having a thing.
translation.ja: 遊びに行こう

translation.en: Oh, come on, buddy.
translation.ja: おいで

translation.en: Why didn't you want to be my girlfriend?
translation.ja: なぜ付き合わない？

translation.en: You're drunk.
translation.ja: 酔ってる

translation.en: Oh, come on. Look, I'm leaving anyway.
translation.ja: 言えよ　じき街を去る

translation.en: You said you like how I smell.
translation.ja: 匂いは好きだと

translation.en: I wanna get good at sex.
translation.ja: セックスの練習よ

translation.en: -[scoffs] -This has been practice.
translation.ja: うまくなりたいの

translation.en: One day I will fall in love,
translation.ja: いつか本当の恋人と―

translation.en: and when that happens, I'll be ready.
translation.ja: 上手にできるようにね

translation.en: -That's messed up. -You're an asshole.
translation.ja: ひどいな あなたは最低よ！

translation.en: I see you looking at yourself when we're having sex. This isn't just about me for you, either.
translation.ja: セックス中も 自分しか見てないくせに

translation.en: What?
translation.ja: 何よ

translation.en: Fucking invisible self.
translation.ja: やっぱり内面か

translation.en: How many of those have you had?
translation.ja: どれだけ飲んだの？

translation.en: Look, I'll spend the night tonight, okay?
translation.ja: 今夜は一緒にいてあげる

translation.en: If you don't want to be alone?
translation.ja: 独りがイヤなら

translation.en: Yo, this is my house. Pull over.
translation.ja: 俺の家だ　止めろ

translation.en: You're right. I am an asshole.
translation.ja: そうさ　俺は最低だ

translation.en: Yo, keep the 40!
translation.ja: 酒はやる

translation.en: Bye!
translation.ja: あばよ！

translation.en: Hey, don't turn the lights out on us, crazy.
translation.ja: 明かりを消すな　変人

translation.en: [Steve] Look, my parents flipped.
translation.ja: 親がキレた

translation.en: I'm getting Asheville. It could be tonight, it could be next week.
translation.ja: 近々 アシュビル行きだけど―

translation.en: -I'm here anyway, right? -[OA] Right.
translation.ja: 来てやったぜ

translation.en: But I can't.
translation.ja: 足りないわ

translation.en: Oh, come on, OA. Don't hold a grudge.
translation.ja: ＯＡ　文句言うな

translation.en: I need at least five. I told you.
translation.ja: 最低５人 必要なの

translation.en: -We are five. -[OA] Not including me.
translation.ja: いるよ 私を除いて

translation.en: Look, just include yourself and let's get going already.
translation.ja: とにかく始めよう

translation.en: Okay, what exactly is it that we're doing here?
translation.ja: 具体的に何するの？

translation.en: I need to... go somewhere, and I think that you can help me get there.
translation.ja: 目的地へ行くために みんなの力を貸りたい

translation.en: But I'll need to leave something important behind, -and it only works if there are five. -[scoffs]
translation.ja: でも条件があるし ５人いなきゃダメなの

translation.en: Yo, I'm tired of all this shit, OA. I'm...
translation.ja: こんな茶番 ウンザリだ

translation.en: I left my door open.
translation.ja: 扉は開けてきた

translation.en: [OA] I'm gonna tell you my story from the beginning.
translation.ja: 今から私の話をする

translation.en: And there will come a point when you'll see why you're here...
translation.ja: 続けるうち ここにいる理由が分かるわ

translation.en: what you might do together, how you could help people that you'll never meet.
translation.ja: 見ず知らずの人を 共に助ける方法もね

translation.en: But you have to pretend to trust me until you actually do.
translation.ja: 最初はフリでもいい 私を信じて

translation.en: I want you to close your eyes.
translation.ja: 目を閉じて―

translation.en: I want you to imagine everything I tell you as if you're there yourself.
translation.ja: そこにいるかのように 私の話を想像して

translation.en: As if you're with me. As if you are me.
translation.ja: 私と一緒にいるか 私になった気で

translation.en: Close them.
translation.ja: 閉じて

translation.en: I imagine with my eyes open.
translation.ja: 閉じずに想像する

translation.en: [OA] Okay.
translation.ja: なら―

translation.en: Could you close them for me then?
translation.ja: 私のために閉じて

translation.en: I was born in Russia, in 1987.
translation.ja: 私はロシア人　1987年生まれ

translation.en: [scoffs] What?
translation.ja: 何だと？

translation.en: Come on.
translation.ja: ウソだろ

translation.en: My father was a very wealthy man.
translation.ja: 父はとても裕福で―

translation.en: He ran a mining company. He took precious metals out of the ground.
translation.ja: 貴金属の採掘会社を営んでた

translation.en: We were always being watched, because he'd made so much money so quickly.
translation.ja: 瞬時に富を築いたせいで 監視されてたわ

translation.en: And at that time, if you had that kind of money, you paid some of it to the Voi.
translation.ja: 稼ぎを“ヴォイ”に 納めてたしね

translation.en: We lived in a secret enclave just outside Moscow
translation.ja: 私たちは 新富裕層の人々と― モスクワ郊外の 機密区に住んでた

translation.en: with many of the other recent rich.
translation.ja: モスクワ郊外の 機密区に住んでた

translation.en: And the snow was seven feet high,
translation.ja: 大雪が積もっても―

translation.en: but you could still make out many big houses behind big gates lost in the white.
translation.ja: 立派な門を持つ多くの屋敷が 雪に埋もれることはない

translation.en: You asked me how I got my sight. The better story is how I lost it in the first place.
translation.ja: 視力が戻った経緯を話す前に 視力を失った話をするわ

translation.en: I was not born blind.
translation.ja: 私は目が見えてた

translation.en: I remember the bright colored domes of Saint Basil's Cathedral,
translation.ja: 聖ワシリイ大聖堂の 明るい色彩も―

translation.en: the gray waters of the Moskva River.
translation.ja: 暗い川の色も覚えてる

translation.en: Our town was built on the fall. Each house was a new fortune.
translation.ja: 居住区は丘陵地にあり すべてが豪邸で―

translation.en: There was the man who drilled oil, the man who dug coal, the man who made cable.
translation.ja: さまざまな事業で成功した 富豪がいた

translation.en: I grew up with the sons and daughters of these oligarchs.
translation.ja: その子供たちと私は育った

translation.en: My mother died in childbirth.
translation.ja: 母は私を産んで死に―

translation.en: It was just my father and I in a big, lonely house.
translation.ja: 寂しい屋敷に 父と２人で暮らしてた

translation.en: I suffered from things then.
translation.ja: 私は うなされた

translation.en: Dreams. They had smells in them and sounds that were sharper than life.
translation.ja: 匂いまであり 音が現実より鮮明な夢にね

translation.en: In one of them, I'm trapped in an aquarium,
translation.ja: ある夢では水槽の中にいて

translation.en: -and I can't breathe, I can't get out. -[child shouts] Nina!
translation.ja: 息ができず 出られない

translation.en: Papa.
translation.ja: パパ

translation.en: Papa!
translation.ja: パパ！

translation.en: -[shushing] -It came again. The same again.
translation.ja: 〈また同じことが起きた〉

translation.en: I'm underwater and I see the floating crayons and I can't breathe.
translation.ja: 〈お水の中で 息ができなかったの〉

translation.en: [shushing] It's just a dream, my little cabbage.
translation.ja: 〈ニーナ ただの夢だよ〉

translation.en: A fantasy.
translation.ja: 〈幻想さ〉

translation.en: No. I felt it just like I feel you pinching my nose.
translation.ja: 〈鼻をつままれた みたいに―〉 〈ちゃんと感じたの〉

translation.en: Cancel this afternoon. Move everything to this evening.
translation.ja: 〈予定を夜に変更しろ〉

translation.en: We are going to get rid of this nightmare.
translation.ja: 〈悪夢を消そう〉

translation.en: [Azarov] Stop here.
translation.ja: 〈止めろ〉

translation.en: Keep the car warm.
translation.ja: 〈暖めとけ〉

translation.en: Come on, cabbage.
translation.ja: 〈おいで〉

translation.en: Nina.
translation.ja: ニーナ

translation.en: [in Russian] Papa, it's too cold. I can't.
translation.ja: 〈パパ　凍えちゃう〉

translation.en: What's the only way to fight cold?
translation.ja: 〈寒さに 打ち勝つ方法は？〉

translation.en: Become colder than it is.
translation.ja: 〈もっと寒くなること〉

translation.en: [OA in English] My father taught me about bravery that day.
translation.ja: 父は勇気をくれた

translation.en: That night, it was so cold, one of our horses froze to death.
translation.ja: その晩は飼い馬が 凍死するほど冷え込んだ

translation.en: But the dreams of the aquarium never came back.
translation.ja: でも悪夢は消え去ったわ

translation.en: Months passed. My nose didn't bleed once.
translation.ja: 鼻血も出なくなった

translation.en: I had started school now.
translation.ja: 私は通学し始めた

translation.en: All the kids in the neighborhood were picked up on a special bus. I was always first.
translation.ja: 専用の通学バスは いつも最初に私を迎えに来た

translation.en: I felt something in the pit of my stomach...
translation.ja: その日は 胃に違和感があったの

translation.en: like the eggs were sitting there stuck, unbroken.
translation.ja: 卵が割れずに 残ってる気がして―

translation.en: I felt like I wanted to get off that bus.
translation.ja: バスを降りたかった

translation.en: [in Russian] Yeah, but I didn't like it. It made you think too much about death.
translation.ja: 〈あの番組 嫌い〉 〈死が怖くなる〉

translation.en: [boy] Like when the boy shoots himself.
translation.ja: 〈少年が 拳銃自殺してた〉

translation.en: [girl] Yeah, like one day you are here, and then suddenly you aren't here.
translation.ja: 〈ある日 突然 自分がいなくなるのよ〉

translation.en: You aren't anywhere.
translation.ja: 〈消えちゃうの〉

translation.en: Did you see it, Ninny?
translation.ja: 〈ニーナも見た？〉

translation.en: I think you are always somewhere.
translation.ja: 〈死んでも消えないよ〉

translation.en: What's wrong with your nose?
translation.ja: 〈鼻血が〉

translation.en: Oh, it's nothing.
translation.ja: 〈何でもない〉

translation.en: [gasps] There is a light beneath us. Maybe one of the windows is broken.
translation.ja: 〈下に光が見える 穴があるかも〉

translation.en: If we swim deep, maybe we could make it out.
translation.ja: 〈潜れば きっと出られる〉

translation.en: [girl] Nina! Nina!
translation.ja: ニーナ！

translation.en: [OA in English] We were a message, see?
translation.ja: それは警告よ

translation.en: From the Voi to our parents.
translation.ja: ヴォイから親へ―

translation.en: And the message said, "You are powerful businessmen to be sure, but you are not all-powerful."
translation.ja: “権力を握る実業家でも 万能ではない”というね

translation.en: The youngest sons and daughters of every Russian scion was on that bus that day.
translation.ja: バスに乗ってた 彼らの子供たちは―

translation.en: They all died. Every single one of them.
translation.ja: 全員 死んだ １人残らず

translation.en: Including me.
translation.ja: 私もよ

translation.en: I couldn't tell if I was inside the earth or above it.
translation.ja: 地球の内部とも上空とも 知れない―

translation.en: Why was the dark so dazzling?
translation.ja: 強烈な闇の中にいた

translation.en: [Khatun whispering] Nina.
translation.ja: ニーナ

translation.en: [in Arabic] Do you want to go back?
translation.ja: 〈戻りたい？〉

translation.en: You will know great love...
translation.ja: 〈愛を知るのは―〉

translation.en: but it will be very hard.
translation.ja: 〈過酷なことよ〉

translation.en: You will suffer.
translation.ja: 〈ひどく苦しむわ〉

translation.en: Me?
translation.ja: 〈私は―〉

translation.en: I want you to stay here.
translation.ja: 〈ここにいてほしい〉

translation.en: [in Russian] Back.
translation.ja: 〈帰る〉

translation.en: [in Arabic] Then... I will take your eyes.
translation.ja: 〈それなら 両目をもらうわ〉

translation.en: Because I cannot bear for you to see what lies ahead.
translation.ja: 〈この先の出来事を 見せるのは―〉 〈忍びないから〉

translation.en: It's too horrible.
translation.ja: 〈残酷すぎる〉

translation.en: [coughing] Papa.
translation.ja: パパ

translation.en: [OA in English] I could feel his cheek against mine. It was cold. And I could hear his breath.
translation.ja: 私は父の冷たい頬を感じ 息遣いを聞いた

translation.en: And though my eyes were wide open...
translation.ja: でも目を開いても―

translation.en: it was black.
translation.ja: 見えるのは闇だけ

translation.en: I said, "Papa..."
translation.ja: 私は言ったわ　“パパ…”

translation.en: [in Russian] I can't see.
translation.ja: 〈目が見えない〉

translation.en: [in English] "I can't see anything at all."
translation.ja: “何も見えない”と
